content: संहतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Firm or close contact, close union; <ls>Ku. 5. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Union, combination; सहातिः कार्यसाधिका, संहतिः श्रेयसी पुंसां <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> “Unien is strength”. {@--3@} Compactness, firmness, solidity. {@--4@} Bulk, mass; गुरुतां नयंति हि गुणा न संहतिः <ls>Ki. 12. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Agreement, harmony. {@--6@} A collection, heap, assemblage, multitude; वनान्यवांचीव चकार संहतिः <ls>Ki. 14. 34</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 14.">27</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">3. 20</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">5. 4</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 2.</ls> {@--7@} Strength. {@--8@} The body.
